text: Ingaba inkcazo yePaladesi, leyo abakholwayo bathenjiswe ngayo ekumpompoza imilambo emanzi wayo angaphithikezwanga, imilambo yobisi encasa yawo ingaguqukiyo, imilambo yewayini emnandi kwabo bayiselayo, nemilambo yobusi obuhlambulukileyo, abaza kufumana kuyo zonke iintlobo zeziqhamo noxolelo lwezono oluvela eNkosini yabo, yafana na neyabo baza kuhlala eMlilweni ngonaphakade benikwa amanzi atshisayo aza kubuxula amathumbu abo
